colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @052A *, ,(BSNYEN RDZOGS SOGS SU BSGRUB TSUL GYI CHO GA 'KHYER BDE KUN PHAN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI KHAMS @052B GSUM CHOS KYI RGYAL PO SHAR TZONG KHA PA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE SHAR PHYOGS KYI NOR 'DZIN YANGS PA'I GZHI CHEN POR DAR RGYAS SU MDZAD PAR SMON PA'I 'BRAS BU LEGS PAR GRUB PA'I SKYES CHEN 'GRO BA YONGS KYIS PHAN BDE'I RTZA LAG TU GYUR BA'I THO YON HU THOG TU BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSOS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG GYIS ZHES BSKUL BA'I BKA' STZAL DANG DU BLANGS TE, BAN CHUNG SNYOMS LAS PA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN DPAL BZANG POS CHO GA DNGOS GZHI, ,DUS GSUM RGYAL BA'I DBANG PO THAMS CAD MKHYEN CING GZIGS PA DANG NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSO DPAL BZANG POS MDZAD PA'I LAS CHO GA RNAM RGYAL GSER MDOG SGRA JI BZHIN DANG, DUS GO GDAMS NGAG BSHAD PA PHYAG LEN @053A *, ,RNAMS MDOR BSDUS TE 'KHYER BDE BA BSGRIGS PA'I YI GE PA NI CING SDOM BRTZON RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA'I DGE TSUL DPAL BZANG NGO, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO PHYOGS DUS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS, ,)
